explains: adj. 充满敬畏的，畏怯的
vt. 使……敬畏；使……惊叹（awe 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: stand in awe of 敬畏

sentences.cn: 我们敬畏地默然观看着。

sentences.en: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me.
sentences.cn: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.en: Even the pirates were awed, and Tootles cried out hysterically, "I am going to do what my mother hopes."
sentences.cn: 连海盗们心生敬畏，图托斯歇斯底里地叫道：“我要去做我母亲希望我做的事。”
